sentences.en: After an encouraging start, the negotiations deteriorate into a lengthy haggling session.
sentences.cn: 开局不错,但之后的谈判却陷入没完没了的讨价还价.

sentences.en: Cork mold spray solutions have a tendency to deteriorate or ferment.
sentences.cn: 软木粉脱模剂溶液易于变质或发酵.

sentences.en: Did the ordinary colleague relations, are actually originally how start to deteriorate?
sentences.cn: 原本普通的同事关系, 究竟是如何开始变质了?

sentences.en: Do you think relations between China and Japan will continue to deteriorate?
sentences.cn: 你认为中日关系会继续恶化 吗 ?

sentences.en: Don't avoid situations that may deteriorate; try to mend them.
sentences.cn: 对于可能恶化的情况不要回避, 而应尽力弥补.
埃塞尔的健康状况恶化了。

sentences.en: He held that this would only cause the situation to deteriorate further.
sentences.cn: 他认为,这只会使局势更加恶化.

sentences.en: Hydrogen reduces this coating and causes the Element to deteriorate.
sentences.cn: 氢容易破坏这个保护层导致其恶化.

sentences.en: If foolishly there is no teaching, the nature will deteriorate.
sentences.cn: 如果(对幼儿)不(严加)教育, (幼儿善良的)禀性就(将随环境)改变(坏).

sentences.en: It was pathetic to watch her condition deteriorate day by day.
sentences.cn: 看着她的健康状况日益恶化,真是可怜.

sentences.en: Leather can deteriorate in damp conditions.
Police, weary and increasingly sour in mood, wonder aloud why the situation has been allowed to deteriorate.
sentences.cn: 警察们疲惫不堪，心情也越来越糟糕，他们不禁满腹狐疑地问：为什么听凭情况不断地恶化下去？

sentences.en: Rubber, which is a standard insulating material, is liable to deteriorate.
sentences.cn: 橡胶是标准的绝缘物质, 但它的阳光下容易老化.

sentences.en: The tragic situation of European Jewry continued to deteriorate throughout the 1930.
sentences.cn: 欧洲犹太人的悲剧处境连续恶化,贯穿于整个三十年代.

sentences.en: There are fears that the situation might deteriorate into full-scale war.
sentences.cn: 人们担心形势可能恶化而演变成一场全面战争。

sentences.en: This food will deteriorate rapidly on contact with air.
sentences.cn: 这种食物一接触到空气即迅速变坏.
